Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Enacts the "no child left out inclusive playgrounds act"
Summary: Enacts the "no child left out inclusive playgrounds act"; requires newly built and renovated playgrounds to be accessible for children with disabilities.
LawCode: Amd ยง399-dd, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to requiring all new and renovated playgrounds be accessible to all children
